com.austinv11.collectiveframework.minecraft.event

Class FindMatchingRecipeEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • cpw.mods.fml.common.eventhandler.Event
      • com.austinv11.collectiveframework.minecraft.event.FindMatchingRecipeEvent

  • public class FindMatchingRecipeEvent
extends cpw.mods.fml.common.eventhandler.Event
    This event is posted when a crafting recipe is refreshed. Note: This is called BEFORE any item is crafted This is fired on the MinecraftForge event bus
